content.rendered:
Directed by R.S. Durai Senthilkumar

Written by R.S. Durai Senthilkumar

Cast Dhanush (Sakthi / Thiraviyam Perumal). Sneha (Kanyakumari). Mehreen Pirzada (Sadhana Sha). Naveen Chandra (Nilapparai (Nilan)). Nassar (Muthaiah Aasaan). Munishkanth (Kolusu). Kpy Sathish (Puncture). Kothandam (Police Officer). Aravind Akash (Kalai).Azhagu.Suken Babu.Deepa.Master Devan.Gowri. Ilavarasu (Nair).Pandi Jeeva.Kalai.Subhashani Kannan.Karthik.Karuppan.J. Naveen Kumar.Muthu Kumar.Nandini Madesh.Bonda Mani.Manobala.Madura Nayagam.Prema Priya.Senthil Raja.Rajkumar. Rajith.Rudhran.Sanjeev.Satish.Saurav.Senthil.Sindhu.Sriram.Baby Sruthi.Subathara.Sumathi.Pon Suresh.Thoufiq.Nagaraj Vadamalai. Devin Rumer (Muy Thai fighter (uncredited))

Languages Tamil

Producers G. Saravanan. Sai Siddharth. Arjun Thyagarajan. Sendhil Thyagarajan

Production Sathya Jyothi Film
